description: Central registry of deprecated commands, skills, agents, and patterns. Used by audit-references and fix-references skills to detect and remediate outdated references.

claude-write-command.migrationNotes: All claude-* skills follow pattern: claude-{noun}-{verb}

zustand-state-management.reason: Naming convention: frontend-* prefix for frontend-specific skills
zustand-state-management.migrationNotes: All frontend framework skills follow pattern: frontend-{framework}-{feature}

mcp-code-create.reason: Consolidated with mcp-code-2-skill into unified mcp-code-write skill (78.4% token reduction)
mcp-code-create.migrationNotes: Use mcp-code-write Mode 1 for creating wrappers. See MIGRATION.md for detailed guide.

mcp-code-2-skill.reason: Consolidated with mcp-code-create into unified mcp-code-write skill (78.4% token reduction)
mcp-code-2-skill.migrationNotes: Use mcp-code-write Mode 3 for generating service-specific skills. See MIGRATION.md for detailed guide.

claude-skill-audit.reason: Consolidated with claude-skill-fix into unified claude-skill-compliance skill
claude-skill-audit.migrationNotes: Use claude-skill-compliance with audit mode for validation. Supports --phase filtering.

claude-skill-audit-report.reason: Reporting functionality integrated into claude-skill-compliance output
claude-skill-audit-report.migrationNotes: Use claude-skill-compliance audit mode - returns pre-formatted markdown report

claude-skill-fix.reason: Consolidated with claude-skill-audit into unified claude-skill-compliance skill
claude-skill-fix.migrationNotes: Use claude-skill-compliance with fix mode for auto-remediation. Supports --phase filtering and --dry-run.

claude-skill-detect-opportunity.reason: Pattern detection functionality integrated into claude-skill-write workflow
claude-skill-detect-opportunity.migrationNotes: Use claude-skill-write to create skills based on detected patterns

claude-skill-rename.reason: Skill renaming functionality integrated into /skill-manager rename command

claude-mcp-audit-references.reason: MCP reference audit consolidated into mcp-code-compliance (Phase 5)
claude-mcp-audit-references.migrationNotes: Use mcp-code-compliance audit mode with Phase 5 for reference validation

mcp-chrome-devtools-guide.reason: Renamed to follow mcp-tools-{service} naming convention

mcp-code-chrome-devtools-guide.reason: Consolidated into mcp-tools-chrome-devtools with service-specific tools pattern

mcp-code-guide.reason: General MCP code execution guidance integrated into mcp-code-write references
mcp-code-guide.migrationNotes: Refer to mcp-code-write for MCP wrapper implementation patterns

mcp-code-write.reason: Consolidated into unified tool-manager skill with TDD enforcement

mcp-code-compliance.reason: Consolidated into unified tool-manager skill (audit operation)

mcp-code-audit.reason: Consolidated into unified tool-manager skill (audit operation)

mcp-code-fix.reason: Consolidated into unified tool-manager skill (fix operation)

mcp-code-test.reason: Consolidated into unified tool-manager skill (test operation)

claude-agent-write.reason: Consolidated into unified agent-manager skill with TDD enforcement and 8 operations
claude-agent-write.migrationNotes: Use: npm run -w @chariot/agent-manager create -- <name> <desc> OR npm run -w @chariot/agent-manager update -- <name> <changes>

claude-agent-compliance.reason: Consolidated into unified agent-manager skill (audit/fix operations)
claude-agent-compliance.migrationNotes: Use: npm run -w @chariot/agent-manager audit -- <name> [--all] [--phase N] OR npm run -w @chariot/agent-manager fix -- <name> [--dry-run]

claude-agent-search.reason: Consolidated into unified agent-manager skill (search operation)

claude-agent-rename.reason: Consolidated into unified agent-manager skill (rename operation)

claude-agent-skill-discovery.reason: Skill discovery integrated into agent-manager create/update workflows
claude-agent-skill-discovery.migrationNotes: Skill discovery runs automatically after agent creation/update

claude-skill-write.reason: Consolidated into unified skill-manager skill (create/update operations)
claude-skill-write.migrationNotes: Use: npm run -w @chariot/skill-manager create -- <name> "<desc>" OR npm run -w @chariot/skill-manager update -- <name> "<changes>"

claude-skill-compliance.reason: Consolidated into unified skill-manager skill (audit/fix operations)
claude-skill-compliance.migrationNotes: Use: npm run -w @chariot/skill-manager audit -- [name] [--phase N] OR npm run -w @chariot/skill-manager fix -- <name> [--dry-run]

claude-skill-search.reason: Consolidated into unified managing-skills skill with enhanced dual-location search

agent-manager.reason: Renamed to avoid namespace collision with /agent-manager command (same name caused skill resolution instead of command)

skill-manager.reason: Renamed to avoid namespace collision with /skill-manager command (same name caused skill resolution instead of command)

command-manager.reason: Renamed to avoid namespace collision with /command-manager command (same name caused skill resolution instead of command)

tool-manager.reason: Renamed to avoid namespace collision with /tool-manager command (same name caused skill resolution instead of command)

frontend-zustand-state-management.reason: Renamed to follow gerund (-ing) naming convention for consistency with other using-* skills

description: >.reason: Folded scalar (>) collapses blank lines needed in examples
description: >.migrationNotes: Use literal scalar (|) to preserve blank lines in <example> blocks

BashOutput.reason: Not a valid tool - removed from valid tools list

KillBash.reason: Not a valid tool - removed from valid tools list

_metadata.updateProtocol: When renaming via /skill-manager rename or /agent-manager rename, the skill should automatically add an entry here (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED - manual for now)
